text:
Hi! I'm using the api to create and submit a form. I have a question related to the GDPR personal consent for the use of personal data. How do I include it in the api response? <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/submit_form|The docs>  referer to
```subscriptionTypeId```
 But I don't get an it for the personal data consent
Hey! Has anyone ever mapped WordPress' Contact Form 7 to HubSpot fields, so when a user submits a form on the website it posts the information to HubSpot? Without a plugin :slightly_smiling_face:

You could certainly do this using the HubSpot API and setting up an action to POST form submissions from your WordPress server to the HubSpot endpoint.... but honestly we usually just turn on the HubSpot plugin to collect all site forms, and set and forget.
